name: ThreeFish Consulting
description: ThreeFish is a People and Organisation Capability Consulting company that focuses on applying behavioral science to help people and organizations operate at their true potential. We are the Master Distributor for Hogan Assessments in India. ThreeFish follow the Scientist-Practitioner model. Our solutions build on the Science of Organizational Psychology to solve people and organization capability problems. As the Master Distributor for Hogan Assessments, we serve Hogan’s global clients and MNC consulting firms that are Hogan partners. We work closely with Indian companies to integrate Hogan Assessments for leadership assessment and development. We collaborate with other Hogan solution partners and independent practitioners for expanding the Hogan reach and impact in India.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Assessment . Coaching . Consulting
ShortDescription: ThreeFish is a People and Organisation Capability Consulting company that focuses on applying behavioral science to help people and organizations operate at their true potential.

Highlights.name: Assessment
Highlights.description: We use the powerful Science of Personality to predict Leadership Effectiveness.

Highlights.name: Coaching
Highlights.description: We provide coaching support for emerging, mid-level and senior executive level leaders

Highlights.name: Consulting
Highlights.description: We provide Consulting solutions in the areas of Talent Management, Leadership Team Development and bespoke Leadership Learning.

enhanced_description: ThreeFish Consulting is a People and Organisation Capability Consulting company that applies behavioral science, grounded in the Scientist-Practitioner model and Organizational Psychology, to help individuals and organizations realize their full potential. As the Master Distributor for Hogan Assessments in India, ThreeFish integrates these powerful personality assessments for leadership assessment and development, serving Hogan’s global clients, MNC consulting firms, and Indian companies. Their technology-enabled, data-driven solutions with proven impact encompass assessment for predicting leadership effectiveness, coaching for leaders at all levels, and consulting in talent management, leadership team development, and bespoke leadership learning.
key_use_cases: Applying behavioral science for organizational capability enhancement
Solving people and organization capability problems
Integrating Hogan Assessments for leadership assessment and development
Predicting leadership effectiveness through personality science
Providing coaching support for emerging, mid-level, and senior executive leaders
Accelerating and improving top talent acquisition
competitive_advantages: Deep expertise in behavioral science and organizational psychology (Scientist-Practitioner model)
Exclusive Master Distributor for Hogan Assessments in India, providing unique access and expertise
Solutions are data-driven, ensuring evidence-based outcomes
Demonstrated proven impact in client engagements
Leverages technology for enhanced service delivery and insights
implementation_scenarios: Integration of Hogan Assessments into client leadership assessment and development programs
Consulting engagements for talent management and leadership development initiatives
Collaborative partnerships with other Hogan solution partners and independent practitioners
integration_capabilities: Integration with Hogan Assessments for client-specific leadership assessment and development initiatives
roi_benefits: Enables people and organizations to operate at their true potential
Solves critical people and organization capability problems
Facilitates faster and more efficient hiring of top talent
Enhances leadership assessment and development outcomes
